meta.title: Golden Retriever vs Standard Poodle: Shedding & Smarts
meta.description: Comparing the Golden Retriever and Standard Poodle. Deciding between the goofy Golden and the intelligent, hypoallergenic Poodle.

comparison_points.title: Shedding / Allergies
comparison_points.verdict: Poodles are the clear winner for allergy sufferers.

comparison_points.title: Intelligence
comparison_points.verdict: Poodles are one of the smartest breeds, but Goldens are easier to motivate.

comparison_points.title: Grooming Cost
comparison_points.verdict: Poodles require professional grooming every 6-8 weeks.
